text: Silent Fall is a 1994 drama and mystery movie. The movie is about a boy with autism who sees a murder. Linda Hamilton plays Karen. Liv Tyler plays Sylvie Warden. John Lithgow plays Dr. Harlinger. Silent Fall got negative reviews from critics. It became a box office bomb. title: Silent Fall
